page.title: 12CHURCH AND THE PEOPLE
page.content: Nearly everone believes in God.Only one or two don't.The majority go to church on special occasions.Only a few go once a week or just once a month.A few don't go at all.More people think that we aren't a religous minded country than people who think we are.A few people said that we were split down the middle.There are only two places of worship,one at Wilton and one at Kirkleatham.There are none at Lazenby,which is the most populated area.Most of the people are Church of England,attending,if they do attend,one or other of the local churches.In 1983 the first marriage took place in the Almshouses private chapel.It was built in 1742.Permission for the wedding had to be obtained from the Archbishop of Canterbury.
